control.name: Input box

property.name: Name
property.helpHtml: Name that can be given to the control. Names are used to help identify controls uniquely.

property.name: Form summary label
property.helpHtml: Summary label to appear at the end of the form. Leave blank to have the control and its value hidden.

property.name: Value
property.helpHtml: Pre-sets the contents of the input field.

property.name: Placeholder
property.helpHtml: Sets a faded message so users can better understand what to type in the input box. Gets erased when typing begins.

property.name: Character limit
property.helpHtml: Sets the character limit of the input box. Does not apply to the number input type.

property.name: Type
property.helpHtml: Sets the type of input box. Large enables the size to be freely altered, number restricts entry to only numbers, password changes the text to blobs and readonly sets the input field to disabled. Telephone and email will apply additional validation rules on the input.
